abstract: Disentangled representation learning aims to represent the underlying generative factors of a dataset in a latent representation independently of one another. In our work, we propose a discrete variational autoencoder (VAE) based model where the …

abstract: Machine learning is permeating every conceivable domain to promote data-driven decision support. The focus is often on advanced black-box models due to their assumed performance advantages, whereas interpretable models are often …

title: Interpretability-Guided Test-Time Adversarial Defense
details: A Kulkarni, TW Weng - arXiv preprint arXiv:2409.15190, 2024
abstract: We propose a novel and low-cost test-time adversarial defense by devising interpretability-guided neuron importance ranking methods to identify neurons important to the output classes. Our method is a training-free approach that can …

title: StyleRemix: Interpretable Authorship Obfuscation via Distillation and Perturbation of Style Elements
details: J Fisher, S Hallinan, X Lu, M Gordon, Z Harchaoui… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2024
abstract: Authorship obfuscation, rewriting a text to intentionally obscure the identity of the author, is an important but challenging task. Current methods using large language models (LLMs) lack interpretability and controllability, often ignoring author-specific …

title: Multi-modal Generative Models in Recommendation System

abstract: Many recommendation systems limit user inputs to text strings or behavior signals such as clicks and purchases, and system outputs to a list of products sorted by relevance. With the advent of generative AI, users have come to expect richer levels …
